text: The 2019 Premier Volleyball League Reinforced Conference was the seventh conference of the Premier Volleyball League (34th conference of the former Shakey's V-League). Conference started on May 26, 2019. Grand Fans Day was held at the Trinoma Activity Center, Quezon City on April 25, 2019. Games were held at the Filoil Flying V Centre, San Juan City, Philippines. Philippine Army returned as Pacific Town-Army Lady Troopers and Motolite Power Builders returned with a new set of players. == Participating teams == {| class="wikitable" style="width:100%; text-align:left" |- ! style=background:#0000CD colspan=7 | |- ! style="background:white" | Abbr. ! style="background:white" | Team ! style="background:white" | Company ! style="background:white" | Colors ! style="background:white" | Head coach ! style="background:white" | Team captain ! style="background:white" | Imports |- | style="text-align:center;"| BLP | BaliPure club colors BaliPure Purest Water Defenders | Balibago Waterworks System, Inc. | style="text- align:center;"| | Rommel Abella | Grazielle Bombita | Danijela Dzakovic Alexandra Vajdovä |- | style="text-align:center;"| BPS | BanKo Perlas Spikers club colors BanKo Perlas Spikers | BPI Direct BanKo, Inc. and Beach Volleyball Republic | style="text-align:center;"| | Apichat Kongsawat | Nicole Anne Tiamzon | Sutadta Chuewulim Stiix Horton Lakia Bright (replaced) Yasemin Sahin Yildirim (replaced) |- | style="text-align:center;"| CCS | border Creamline Cool Smashers | Republic Biscuit Corporation | style="text- align:center;"| | Anusorn "Tai" Bundit | Alyssa Valdez | Aleoscar Blanco Kuttika Kaewpin |- | style="text-align:center;"| MOT | border Motolite Power Builders | Philippine Batteries Inc. | style="text-align:center;"| | Airess Padda | Myla Pablo | Edina Selimovic (replaced) Channon Thompson |- | style="text-align:center;"| PGZ | PetroGazz club colors PetroGazz Angels | PetroGazz Ventures Phils.
